titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation to inform all our loving subjects of the lawfulnesse of our Commissions of Array, issued into the severall counties of our realm of England, and Dominion of Wales, and of the use of them : and commanding them to obey our commissioners therein named, in the execution of their said commissions.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty, and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: With royal coat of arms at head of text.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at York the twentieth day of June, in the eighteenth yeer of Our Reign. 1642.
Imperfect: faded print with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

person.persName: the Kings most excellent Majesty, and
